description:
Occupying a stately Mountain Creek corner position, this immaculately maintained ex Mater Prize home offers vast proportions throughout with timeless architectural design features along with flashes of modern sophistication and style.

Superbly designed over 4 split levels this grand home incorporates 401m² of indoor and outdoor living that includes; 4 huge bedrooms plus large office (or 3 bedrooms and 2 offices), 5 large and separate living areas, a stunning new kitchen with walk-in pantry, 2 large bathrooms with extra powder room on lower level, multiple covered deck areas and outdoor entertaining spaces, an enormous 8m x 7.5m garage/workshop plus additional off-street parking, a large fully fenced yard with plenty of room for the kids and pets, and a resort-sized sparkling inground pool!

Centrally positioned on nearly a 1/4 of an acre of premium Mountain Creek real estate, and within walking distance of schools, shops, parks, public transport, Headland Golf Club, the Creek Tavern and all the walking and cycling tracks that surround the area. Mooloolaba Beach and Esplanade is only a flat bike ride or 6 minutes’ drive away, and with easy motorway access it’s only 10-12 minutes to Sunshine Coast University, Sunshine Coast University Hospital, Sunshine Plaza and Sunshine Coast Airport.

- Grand and immaculately maintained ex Mater Prize home with vast spaces and timeless architectural design features throughout

- Enormous, air-conditioned main living area with feature diamond-shaped stained-glass window and gorgeous timber beams and room dividers separating the lounge, family, and dining room spaces

- Spacious and stunning new kitchen with walk-in pantry and internal laundry

- Kitchen includes quality soft-close cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and unique black glass splashback with built-in TV/LED Monitor (needs to be seen!)

- Additional large living area (currently billiard room) on 1st split level with polished timber floors

- Further spectacular living space on top level (currently media/library) with polished timber floors and soaring cathedral-like ceiling with exposed timber beams

- 3 enormous bedrooms on main upper level (each a minimum of 19m²!), all with air-conditioning, dual built-in robes (walk-ins to main) and ceiling fans

- Main bedroom includes large ensuite with its own stained-glass window and large adjoining sunroom/parents retreat with vaulted ceiling

- Large and modernised main bathroom and separate toilet

- Additional 4th bedroom (currently used as office) on lower level with air-conditioning

- A 2nd office or study space with powder room adjoins the 4th bedroom and together offers fantastic options for business use or to transform into a self-contained studio with separate entry

- 6kW solar power system, heat pump hot water system, alarm and CCTV system, quality mesh security screens, ceiling fans and energy efficient lighting throughout

- 2 separate and covered outdoor entertaining decks including a large observatory-styled space with perimeter timber benches, high ceilings, exposed beams and unique polycarbonate wall panels with gas lift struts

- Supersized and sparkling resort style pool with waterfall, spa bench, Bali Hut, and feature gardens and deck areas surrounding

- Oversized 8m x 7.5m automatic double garage/workshop with 2.5m high roller door clearance (new motors with remotes)

- 3m wide gated access into front yard along with additional off-street driveway parking

- Large and fully fenced yard with plenty of grassed area perfect for the kids and pets

- Beautifully established and low maintenance gardens with garden shed

- All located on a large and level 917m² block with private and stylish boundary walls surrounding the home!

Property Code: 106
